post.description: Returns a single Agent by ID.
Returns a list of all Agents.

collections_limit.title:
Collections limit. Only get Databases and collection stats if the total number of collections in the server
is less than this value. 0: no limit

username.description: MySQL username for scraping metrics.

tls_skip_verify.description: Skip TLS certificate and hostname validation.

tablestats_group_table_limit.description:
Tablestats group collectors will be disabled if there are more than that number of tables.
0 means tablestats group collectors are always enabled (no limit).
Negative value means tablestats group collectors are always disabled.

push_metrics.description: Enables push metrics mode for exporter.

inventoryAgentStatus.description:
AgentStatus represents actual Agent status.

 - STARTING: Agent is starting.
 - RUNNING: Agent is running.
 - WAITING: Agent encountered error and will be restarted automatically soon.
 - STOPPING: Agent is stopping.
 - DONE: Agent finished.
 - UNKNOWN: Agent is not connected, we don't know anything about it's state.

pmm_agent_id.description: The pmm-agent identifier which runs this instance.

disabled.description: Desired Agent status: enabled (false) or disabled (true).

azure_database_resource_type.title: Azure database resource type (mysql, maria, postgres)

status.description: Actual Agent status (the same for several configurations).

listen_port.description: Listen port for scraping metrics (the same for several configurations).

push_metrics_enabled.description: True if the exporter operates in push metrics mode.

inventoryAzureDatabaseExporter.description: AzureDatabaseExporter runs on Generic or Container Node and exposes RemoteAzure Node metrics.

enable.description: Enable this Agent. Can't be used with disabled.

disable.description: Disable this Agent. Can't be used with enabled.

enable_push_metrics.description:
Enables push metrics with vmagent, can't be used with disable_push_metrics.
Can't be used with agent version lower then 2.12 and unsupported agents.

disable_push_metrics.description: Disables push metrics, pmm-server starts to pull it, can't be used with enable_push_metrics.

inventoryChangeCommonAgentParams.description: ChangeCommonAgentParams contains parameters that can be changed for all Agents.

runs_on_node_id.description: Node identifier where this instance runs.

disabled.description: If disabled, metrics from this exporter will not be collected.

username.description: HTTP basic auth username for collecting metrics.

scheme.description: Scheme to generate URI to exporter metrics endpoints.

metrics_path.description: Path under which metrics are exposed, used to generate URI.

push_metrics_enabled.description: True if exporter uses push metrics mode.

inventoryExternalExporter.description: ExternalExporter runs on any Node type, including Remote Node.

pmm_agent_id.description:
Return only Agents started by this pmm-agent.
Exactly one of these parameters should be present: pmm_agent_id, node_id, service_id.

node_id.description:
Return only Agents that provide insights for that Node.
Exactly one of these parameters should be present: pmm_agent_id, node_id, service_id.

service_id.description:
Return only Agents that provide insights for that Service.
Exactly one of these parameters should be present: pmm_agent_id, node_id, service_id.

inventoryVMAgent.description:
VMAgent runs on Generic or Container Node alongside pmm-agent.
It scrapes other exporter Agents that are configured with push_metrics_enabled
and uses Prometheus remote write protocol to push metrics to PMM Server.
